name: Earth Below
description:
Earth Below - A wander game by Rusty Jim

Find yourself cast adrift from the last remnants of humanity in space and hunt on Earth Below for supplies.

The earth has been overrun with colourful ghosts. The bad news is they're everywhere. The good news is that you can defeat them with the power of bangin' tunes!

Using your trusty stereo, fend off ghosts, collect resources and bring them back to the transporter to achieve points. Try to beat the high score!

Controls:

WASD to move, shift to run.

E to pick up and deposit objects

Z to rewind

X to play/pause

C to fast forward!
